attributes.action: Make all emergency service staff exempt from national insurance payments.
attributes.additional_details: The emergency services, especially the NHS, are the hardest hit during this time of pandemic. They are also some of the lowest paid workers yet they provide the most valuable service to the country. They work tirelessly to provide for the country while putting their own lives, and those of their families, at risk for very little reward. It is about time this changed and some form of thank you given back to them. It isn't much but them not paying national insurance would greatly help them.
attributes.background: Make emergency service employees exempt from paying national insurance.

rejection.details: We think this petition is similar: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845
